1529063467_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body:
> [republicofme](#comment_8_11WQHH4nhf1MGx2f75r95FKjbbQo8bA2u): Be the best you can be, and good things will come your way. Clean yourself up, get into shape, dress well, and put good vibes out there. Everyone is attracted to someone with a positive trajectory - embody that.

Spot on! You can call it output, confidence or even intention, all of these define the way others perceive you. It's not about faking a personality, it's about natural confidence of action. Do it your way as they say, behave the way you would behave.
